DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to provide comprehensive follow-up in patients with Long QT Syndrome (LQTS) and gain additional information regarding genotype-phenotype correlation and effective management and treatment options.
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Evaluation of Children and Young Adults With Genotype Positive Long QT Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Children and/or young adults diagnosed with heterogeneous repolarization disorder who have genotype positive Long QT, or Newly diagnosed mutation positive patients with a confirmed test Children who are phenotypically positive with no molecular testing Children that are phenotypically positive but genotype negative
